    How It Works

    3 steps. Done.

    1

    Install

    Copy doc-kit into your AI agent's skills folder.

    cp -r doc-kit ~/.gemini/antigravity/skills/
    2

    Scan

    Run the CLI ‚Äî pick doc type, output format, scope.

    bash dockit-master.sh
    3

    Deploy

    Paste the prompt. AI generates everything. Ship it.

    Complete architecture, DB, API, SOP docs ‚Äî ready to deploy.
